title: Meike FC-100 Macro Ring Flash/Light for Canon
description:
The Meike FC-100 is a ring type macro flash light designed particularly for close-up, medical, scientific, forensic photography, etc. Built with 32 pieces high intensity LED's, this Meike macro ring flash illuminates the subject, no matter how low the lighting conditions are. You can use this LED flash light as an instant flash or for non-stop light photo shooting, which is mainly required in close-up photography. Equipped with pre-flash system, this Meike macro ring flash allows you to turn on either full illumination or partial illumination, depending on the lighting situation. Note:
The optimal focal length is 50mm (35mm film format), black corner may occur when you use wide angle lens.
Please see user manual carefully before use. Package includes: 
FC100 Macro Ring FLASH x1, 
52mm Adapter Ring X1,
55mm Adapter Ring X1,
58mm Adapter Ring X1,
62mm Adapter Ring X1,
67mm Adapter Ring X1,
72mm Adapter Ring X1,
77mm Adapter Ring X1,
English manual x1.
